whyme.descripeme: I am motivated to continuously learn new technologies and develop myself. My ability to solve complex problems and my passion for programming make me a valuable member of your team.

myskills.intro: The IT landscape is continuously evolving, with new technologies and methodologies. Staying motivated to expand my IT skills requires a strategic approach, a curious mindset, and a commitment to lifelong learning
myskills.challange: I am always happy to learn new technologies, just tell me what you need.

mywork.joinabout: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

mywork.nextWork: I am currently working with a small group on a project called 'MÃ¼nster Interessierts'. The team came together at MSHack 2024 and is currently supported by the Solution Enabler Program. I support the frontend with Nuxt3 / Vue.js.

references.firstcomment: Toni is characterized by his pronounced determination. With his adaptable nature, he always finds constructive solutions to continue on the path he has chosen and achieve the agreed goals, even when faced with challenges. These qualities make him a great asset to the entire team.
references.secondcomment: Toni was an asset to the team as he always had an overview of the project and was able to solve problems in a targeted manner. In addition, he was always a good and helpful contact person and has a focused and effective way of thinking.
references.thirdcomment: Toni is friendly, helpful and provided excellent support to the team during the project. He always had a solution at hand and stood out for his determination when it came to completing projects quickly and efficiently. Without his commitment, it would have taken us much longer to complete the project.

contact.letsWorkTogetherText: Whether your project involves developing a new application , upgrading existing systems, or implementing robust cybersecurity measures, I Have the technical acumen and problem-solving skills to ensure successful outcomes.
